title: ML Model Deployment Pipeline
description: End-to-end ML pipeline for training, deploying, and monitoring machine learning models in production
longDescription: Built a complete MLOps pipeline using Docker, Kubernetes, and MLflow for automated model training, versioning, and deployment. Implemented CI/CD workflows for seamless model updates and monitoring dashboards for performance tracking.

title: Advanced NLP Sentiment Analyzer
description: Deep learning model for real-time sentiment analysis with 95% accuracy on social media data
longDescription: Developed a transformer-based sentiment analysis system using BERT and fine-tuned on domain-specific data. Achieved 95% accuracy with real-time inference capabilities. Deployed as a REST API serving 1000+ requests per second.

title: Real-Time Object Detection System
description: Custom YOLOv8-based object detection system for autonomous vehicle applications
longDescription: Built and optimized a real-time object detection system achieving 60+ FPS on edge devices. Trained custom YOLOv8 model on specialized dataset with data augmentation and transfer learning techniques. Deployed on NVIDIA Jetson for edge inference.

title: Personalized Recommendation Engine
description: Collaborative filtering system serving personalized recommendations for 100K+ users
longDescription: Designed and implemented a hybrid recommendation system combining collaborative filtering and content-based approaches. Utilized matrix factorization and deep learning embeddings to improve recommendation quality by 40%. Scaled to handle millions of interactions daily.

title: Time Series Forecasting Platform
description: LSTM-based forecasting system for predicting business metrics with high accuracy
longDescription: Developed an automated time series forecasting platform using LSTM and Prophet models. Implemented feature engineering pipeline and hyperparameter optimization. Achieved 92% forecast accuracy for monthly predictions across multiple business metrics.

title: ML Model Monitoring Dashboard
description: Real-time monitoring and alerting system for ML models in production
longDescription: Created a comprehensive monitoring solution for tracking model performance, data drift, and concept drift. Integrated automated alerting for model degradation and anomaly detection. Built with real-time visualization dashboards for MLOps teams.
